name: Galaxy Glitch
description:
Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Created by me and my buddy Titus. We're just two designers without any art/sound people.

The theme was "OUT OF CONTROL" so we decided to make a little top-down arcade shooter where bits of functionality are stripped away by glitches in the system. How long can you survive?

Uses assets acquired from "Bundle for Racial Justice and Equality" (https://itch.io/b/520/bundle-for-racial-justice-and-equality)

Sprite assets by Kenney (https://kenney.nl/)

BGM is "Jump and Shoot Man" by Bit By Bit Bert (https://bit-by-bit-sound.itch.io/)

Title font is "Dark Future" by Essqué Productions (https://www.dafont.com/dark-future.font)

Text font is "Future Earth" by V. Sarela (https://www.dafont.com/future-earth.font)

Background image is "Dynamic Space Background Lite" by DinV Studio (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/dynamic-space-backgr...)
